dc:title: A Knight For A Day
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: A tender reminiscence of Stanley Vishnewski, the first to join her after she met Peter Maurin. Recalls how he saved her life, his companionship, generosity, and those who delighted in him. "I miss Stanley."
